name: Do it slowly
description:
What is this stuff?

  • This game is about controlling your movements and achieving "the red button"
  •  Every 10 seconds, level being restarted. You have only this time to complete it
  • There are 10 levels that you have to finish and gather something tasty at the end 

 Some tips and tricks for a pro nerfer

  • Use time slow mode. It is very helpful sometimes!
  •  Game wants you to always move around. Missles will miss some shots, but then goes toward target you
  • Try speed up menu wheel with wheel of your mouse
  •  If you want to know more, just open "info" panel in main menu 

Controls

  • W,A,S,D - movement
  • SPACE - jump
  • LEFT SHIFT - dash
  • Q - slowmo
  • Look around with mouse

We've tried to make levels hard, so if you pass it easily, we are proud of you

Hope you'll enjoy it!
